title: Insurance
context: §460J-25 Insurance. No person shall engage in the business of pest control unless the person has filed with the board a general liability and workers&rsquo; compensation insurance policy approved by the board in an amount prescribed by the board through its rules; provided that no employee of any company need have such policy in effect with respect to work covered by a policy of the company by which the employee is employed. This section shall not apply to vault fumigation. [L 1972, c 134, pt of §1; am L 1980, c 125, §2; gen ch 1985; am L 1991, c 16, §8; am L 1993, c 74, §11; am L 2004, c 175, §4]
